snippet.title: Pie recipes
snippet.description:
Food
From chicken and fish pies for main course to Mississippi mud and Key Lime pies for dessert, there's a pie to suit all tastes

snippet.title: Who What Why: How dangerous is liquid nitrogen?
snippet.description:
Magazine / 8 October 2012
… technique, with a cursory internet search throwing up recipes for nitro-caramel popcorn and pumpkin pie ice-cream (made with liquid nitrogen)

snippet.title: Is a potato-only diet good for you?
snippet.description:
Magazine / 29 November 2010
… he feasted on mashed potato formed into a turkey shape, and pumpkin pie made with - you guessed it - mashed potato with pumpkin pie flavouring…

snippet.title: Julia Lewis: Homestead Park in York and Pumpkin pie recipe
snippet.description:
BBC Radio York / 24 November 2013
Julia Lewis tours Homestead Park in York and the bake of the day is Pumpkin Pie.
